rows.label: qev015391_MSG0001
rows.name: Excuse me, [ST:gender p1=sir p2=ma'am ], may I help you with— Oh![ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0002
rows.name:
You must be the [ST:gender p1=man  p2=woman  ]who wanted to arrange
a memorial service here at the cathedral.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0003
rows.name: ...You're not? Oh. I see.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0004
rows.name:
Forgive the confusion. Someone came by the cathedral
with that request while I was away.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0005
rows.name:
But the person who took the message forgot to get the
visitor's name, and no one seems to know who it was.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0006
rows.name:
I was hoping to hold the service as soon as possible.
I would be remiss if I failed to do everything in my
power to ease the suffering of the bereaved.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0007
rows.name: Hmmm...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0008
rows.name:
If you don't mind my asking, as a BLADE who travels
widely throughout the city, might you be able to
surmise the identity of the bereaved?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0009
rows.name:
The only information I have is that this person runs a
restaurant in the commercial district and recently lost
a son.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_JNK0010
rows.name: Guess Pauline[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_SEL0011
rows.name: Speculate that it's probably Pauline.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_JNK0020
rows.name: Guess Coco[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_SEL0021
rows.name: Speculate that it's probably Coco.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0010
rows.name:
You say Pauline is mourning the loss of a regular
named Bobby who was like a son to her?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0011
rows.name: And you recently reclaimed Bobby's personal effects?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0012
rows.name: Yes, that makes sense. Thank you very much.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0013
rows.name:
I shall prepare a fine memorial service for Bobby,
in hopes that it might bring some measure of solace
to Pauline.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0014
rows.name:
Of course, the best way to heal the pain of a loss
like that would be to reclaim the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0015
rows.name: Then all of our fallen could return in their mortal forms.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0016
rows.name: Ah, I know Coco. She works at the same café as Jo.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0017
rows.name: To remain so stoic despite the loss of her beloved son...[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0018
rows.name:
What a truly strong-hearted person she must be!
Although I suppose she'd have to be to look after
Jo day in and day out.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0019
rows.name:
Thank you very much. I will go straight to her shop
and begin preparing a memorial service to bring her
some small measure of solace.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0020
rows.name:
Of course, the best way to heal the pain of a loss
like that would be to reclaim the Lifehold Core.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: qev015391_MSG0021
rows.name: Then all of our fallen could return in their mortal forms.[ST:wait ]
